FOREST.description: 城堡是个谎言， 但这里仍有免费的烤鸡， 所以没关系。

LIBRARY.description: 这个安静的长条形图书馆是休息、 冥想和搜寻烤鸡的理想场所。 但这里为什么会有石面具？
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
金币加成50%
幸运加成10%

GREENACRES.description: 不允许凡人进入的地方。 命运时时刻刻都在改变。
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
金币加成50%
幸运加成10%

WAREHOUSE.description: 藏在这里的神奇地图， 可能最终会带我们找到吸血鬼， 或者至少找到更多的烤鸡。
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
金币加成50%
幸运加成10%

MOLISE.description: 存在着不存在的地方。来放松享受生活。乡下见。
MOLISE.hyperTips: 50%金币奖励/n20%幸运奖励莫里斯生命+60%

TOWER.description: 这座塔拥有伟大的魔法文物和历史上准确的怪物。

BONEZONE.description: 到这里来, 说你那邪恶的晚祷。
BONEZONE.tips: 没有物品掉落。 敌人会随着时间的推移变得更强大。

SINKING.description: When the moon is red and bright, the remnants of a town swallowed by the sea come back to the surface, bringing mysteries and riches.

STAGEX.description: Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...

CHAPEL.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to go chase some random vampire instead.

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"

FOREST.description: The Castle is a lie, but there's still free roast chicken here, so it's all good.

LIBRARY.description: This quiet, long library is the ideal place where to rest, meditate, and forage for roast chicken. But what's a stone mask doing here?

GREENACRES.description: A place where mortals are not allowed. Fate changes every minute.
GREENACRES.tips: Random enemy waves from normal stages

WAREHOUSE.description: The magic map hidden in here might finally lead us to a vampire, or at least to more roast chicken.

MOLISE.description: There exist places that don't exist. Come to relax and enjoy life. See you in the country.
MOLISE.hyperTips:
50% Gold Bonus
20% Luck bonus
Enemies Health +60%

TOWER.description: This tower holds great magical artifacts and historically accurate monsters.

BONEZONE.description: Come over here and say your unholy vespers.
BONEZONE.tips: No item drops. Enemies grow stronger over time.

SINKING.description: When the moon is red and bright, the remnants of a town swallowed by the sea come back to the surface, bringing mysteries and riches.

STAGEX.description: Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...

CHAPEL.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to go chase some random vampire instead.

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"

FOREST.description: Le Château est un mensonge. Mais il reste quand même du poulet rôti gratuit dans le coin, alors tout va bien.

LIBRARY.description: Ce couloir silencieux est l'endroit idéal pour se reposer, méditer et chercher du poulet rôti. Mais qu'est-ce que fait un masque de pierre ici ?
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
Bonus d'Or de 50%
Bonus de Chance de 10%.

GREENACRES.description: Un lieu où les mortels ne sont pas les bienvenus. Chaque minute qui passe fait vaciller le destin.
GREENACRES.tips: Vagues d'ennemis aléatoires des niveaux normaux
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
Bonus d'Or de 50%
Bonus de Chance de 10%.

WAREHOUSE.description: La carte magique cachée ici pourrait enfin nous mener à un vampire, ou au moins à plus de poulet rôti.
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
Bonus d'Or de 50%
Bonus de Chance de 10%.

MOLISE.description: Il existe des endroits qui n'existent pas. Venez vous détendre et profiter de la vie. On se voit à la campagne.
MOLISE.hyperTips:
Bonus d'Or de 50%,
Bonus de Chance de 20%,
Santé des ennemis de 60%.

TOWER.description: Cette tour regorge de super artéfacts magiques et de monstres historiquement redoutables.

BONEZONE.description: Venez donc par ici et récitez vos versets impies.
BONEZONE.tips: Pas d'objets à récupérer. Plus la partie dure, plus les ennemis sont forts.

SINKING.description: Lorsque la lune est rouge et brillante, les vestiges d'une ville engloutie par les flots refait surface, dévoilant mystères et richesses.

STAGEX.description: Attendez, vous pouvez voir ça aussi ? C'est pas normal...

CHAPEL.description: Sommes-nous allés trop loin ? On aurait pu rester camper dans la forêt avec tout plein de poulet, mais noooon, il a fallu qu'on aille chasser ce vampire lambda à la place.

RASH.description: "Très chers invités, le moment que nous attendions tous est enfin arrivé ! Regardons les Survivants tenter ce défi... qui a un air de déjà-vu !"

FOREST.description: Das Schloss ist eine Lüge, aber hier gibt es trotzdem kostenloses Brathähnchen, also ist alles gut.

LIBRARY.description: Diese ruhige, lange Bibliothek ist der ideale Ort zum Ausruhen, Meditieren und um Brathähnchen zu sammeln. Aber was macht die Steinmaske hier?

GREENACRES.description: Ein Ort, an dem Sterbliche nicht erlaubt sind. Das Schicksal ändert sich jede Minute.
GREENACRES.tips: Wellen von zufälligen Gegnern von normallen Stufen.

WAREHOUSE.description: Die hier versteckte, magische Karte führt uns vielleicht endlich zu einem Vampir oder zumindest zu weiteren Brathähnchen.

MOLISE.description: Dort existieren Orte die nicht existieren. Komm um dich zu erholen und das Leben zu genießen. Wir sehen uns auf dem Land.

TOWER.description: This tower holds great magical artifacts and historically accurate monsters.

BONEZONE.description: Come over here and say your unholy vespers.
BONEZONE.tips: No item drops. Enemies grow stronger over time.

SINKING.description: When the moon is red and bright, the remnants of a town swallowed by the sea come back to the surface, bringing mysteries and riches.

STAGEX.description: Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...

CHAPEL.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to go chase some random vampire instead.

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"

FOREST.description: 城は偽物だが、 ここではタダでロースト チキンが手に入るのでいいとしよう。

LIBRARY.description: このどこまでも長く続く図書館は、 いつでも静けさに包まれている。  休息や瞑想はもちろんのこと……  ローストチキン探しにもぴったりだ。しかし、 なぜこんなところに石の仮面があるんだろうか？
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
50%のゴールドボーナス
10%の運気ボーナス

GREENACRES.description: 人間は決して立ち入れない場所。 ここでは運命が数分で変わってしまう。
GREENACRES.tips: 通常ステージの敵のランダムウェーブ
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
50%のゴールドボーナス
10%の運気ボーナス

WAREHOUSE.description: ここに隠された魔法の地図が吸血鬼に導 いてくれるかもしれないし、 少なくともローストチキンをもっと食べること ができるかもしれない。
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
50%のゴールドボーナス
10%の運気ボーナス

MOLISE.description:
実在しない場所も存在する。
リラックスして人生を楽しもう。
田舎で会いましょう。
MOLISE.hyperTips:
金貨50%ボーナス
運気10％ボーナス
敵の体力+60%

TOWER.description:
この塔には、素晴らしい魔法の品々や歴
史上実在したモンスターが隠れています。

BONEZONE.description: こっちに来て、邪悪な祈りを捧げなさい。
BONEZONE.tips:
アイテムドロップはありません。
敵は時間経過で強くなる。

SINKING.description: 月が赤く輝く頃、 海に呑み込まれた町の名残が蘇り、 謎と富をもたらす。
SINKING.tips: エクストラステージアイテム

STAGEX.description: えっ、 これも見えるの？ これはおかしいぞ...。

CHAPEL.description: 行き過ぎたかな？ 森でキャンプすることもできたのに チキンを持って...  代わりにヴァンパイアを追わなければならないとはね

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"

FOREST.description: 성은 가짜지만 바닥에 공짜 치킨이 굴러다니네요. 뭐 아무래도 좋지 않습니까?

LIBRARY.description: 조용하고 큰 도서관으로 휴식, 명상은 물론 치킨을 찾으러 다니기에도 좋습니다. 그런데 돌가면은 어디에 쓰는거죠?

GREENACRES.description: 이 곳은 필멸자에게 허락된 곳이 아닙니다. 운명은 언제든지 바뀔 수 있습니다.

WAREHOUSE.description: 이 공장에 숨겨진 마법지도는 우리를 뱀파이어에게 이끌지도 모릅니다. 아니라도 치킨은 더 얻을수 있겠죠.

MOLISE.description: 존재하지 않은 장소가 있습니다. 자연을 존중하며 휴식을 취하고 인생을 즐기세요.
MOLISE.hyperTips:
골드 50% 보너스
행운 20% 보너스
적 체력 +60%

TOWER.description: 이 위대한 탑에는 놀라운 마법의 유물과 과거의 괴물들이 봉인되어 있습니다.

BONEZONE.description: 이 불길한 장소에 당신의 저주받은 기도를 바쳐라.
BONEZONE.tips: 골드를 제외한 다른 아이템이 드랍되지 않으며 적들이 시간이 지날수록 강력해집니다.

SINKING.description: 붉은 달이 떠오를때 바다에 삼켜진 신비한 마을이 다양한 마법 유물들과 함께 수면위로 떠오릅니다.

CHAPEL.description: 이런 우리가 너무 멀리 왔네요. 쫓아가던 닭과 함께 숲에서 야영을 할 수도 있었지만, 우리는 눈 앞에 있는 뱀파이어를 쫓아 가기로 했습니다.

RASH.description: "친애하는 내빈 여러분, 우리 모두가 간절히 바라고 있던 순간이 드디어 찾아 왔습니다! 생존자들이 부활한 보스에 도전하여 과연 살아남을수 있을까요? 다같이 축제를 즐깁시다!"

FOREST.description: O Castelo é uma mentira, mas ao menos tem frango assado aqui, então tudo bem.

LIBRARY.description: Esta biblioteca quieta e longa é o lugar ideal para descansar, meditar e procurar frangos assados. Mas o que uma máscara de pedra está fazendo aqui?
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
50% Bônus em moedas
10% Bônus de Sorte

GREENACRES.description: Um lugar onde mortais não são permitidos. O destino muda a cada minuto.
GREENACRES.tips: Ondas aleatórias de inimigos das fases normais.
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
50% Bônus em moedas
10% Bônus de Sorte

WAREHOUSE.description: O mapa mágico escondido aqui pode finalmente nos guiar até um vampiro, ou pelo menos até mais frango assado.
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
50% Bônus em moedas
10% Bônus de Sorte

MOLISE.description: Aqui existem lugares que não existem. Venha relaxar e curtir a vida. Te vejo por aí.
MOLISE.hyperTips:
50% Bônus em moedas
20% bônus de sorte
Saúde dos inimigos +60%

TOWER.description: Esta torre possui grandes artefatos mágicos e monstros históricamente corretos.

BONEZONE.description: Venha aqui e diga seus versículos profanos.
BONEZONE.tips: Nenhum drop de items. Inimigos ficam mais fortes com o tempo.

SINKING.description: When the moon is red and bright, the remnants of a town swallowed by the sea come back to the surface, bringing mysteries and riches.

STAGEX.description: Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...

CHAPEL.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to go chase some random vampire instead.

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"

FOREST.description: О Замке, конечно, лгут, но здесь всё ещё есть бесплатный жареный цыплёнок, так что все хорошо.

LIBRARY.description: Эта тихая длинная библиотека - идеальное место для отдыха, медитации и поиска жареного цыплёнка. Но что здесь делает каменная маска?
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
50% бонус к Золоту
10% бонус к Удаче

GREENACRES.description: Место, куда смертным вход воспрещён! Всё может выйти из-под контроля в любой момент.
GREENACRES.tips: Случайные вражеские волны с обычных этапов.
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
50% бонус к Золоту
10% бонус к Удаче

WAREHOUSE.description: Волшебная карта спрятана здесь. Может она, наконец, приведет нас к вампиру или, по крайней мере, к еще одному жареному цыплёнку.
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
50% бонус к Золоту
10% бонус к Удаче

MOLISE.description: Существуют места, которых не существует. Приезжайте отдыхать и наслаждаться жизнью. Увидимся в деревне!
MOLISE.hyperTips:
50% бонус к Золоту
20% бонус к Удаче
Здоровье врагов +60%

TOWER.description: В этой башне хранятся великие магические артефакты и исторически достоверные монстры.

BONEZONE.description: Иди сюда и отслужи свою нечестивую вечерню.
BONEZONE.tips: Нет выпадения предметов. Враги усиливаются со временем.

SINKING.description: Когда луна красная и яркая, остатки города, поглощенного морем, возвращаются на поверхность, принося с собой тайны и богатства.

STAGEX.description: Подожди, ты тоже это видишь? Это неправильно...

CHAPEL.description: Не зашли ли мы слишком далеко? Можно было бы просто разбить лагерь в лесу со всем этим циплёнком, но нееет, вместо этого нам пришлось гоняться за каким-то случайным вампиром.

RASH.description: "Уважаемые гости, момент, которого мы все так ждали, наконец-то настал! Давайте посмотрим, как Выжившие пытаются пройти это испытание с переработанными активами!"

FOREST.description: El castillo es de mentira, pero aún queda pollo asado gratis por aquí, así que no pasa nada.

LIBRARY.description: Esta biblioteca tranquila y grande es perfecta para descansar, meditar y recolectar pollo asado. ¿Qué hace aquí esta máscara de piedra?
LIBRARY.hyperTips:
Bonus de 50 % de oro
Bonus de 10 % de suerte

GREENACRES.description: Un lugar prohibido para los mortales. Su destino cambia cada minuto.
GREENACRES.tips: Random enemy waves from normal stages
GREENACRES.hyperTips:
Bonus de 50 % de oro
Bonus de 10 % de suerte

WAREHOUSE.description: The magic map hidden in here might finally lead us to a vampire, or at least to more roast chicken.
WAREHOUSE.hyperTips:
Bonus de 50 % de oro
Bonus de 10 % de suerte

MOLISE.description: There exists places that don't exist. Come to relax and enjoy life. See you in the country.
MOLISE.hyperTips:
50% Gold Bonus
20% Luck bonus
Enemies Health +60%

TOWER.description: This tower holds great magical artifacts and historically accurate monsters.

BONEZONE.description: Come over here and say your unholy vespers.
BONEZONE.tips: No item drops. Enemies grow stronger over time.

SINKING.description: When the moon is red and bright, the remnants of a town swallowed by the sea come back to the surface, bringing mysteries and riches.

STAGEX.description: Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...

CHAPEL.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to go chase some random vampire instead.

RASH.description: "Distinguished guests, the moment we've all be itching for is finally here! Let's watch the Survivors attempt this challenge of recycled assets!"
